00112 inline void CShapeControl::SetShapeTransform(const i2d::CAffine2d& transform)
00113 {
00114        m_shapeTransform = transform;
00115        if (m_shapeTransformMode != STM_VIEW){
00116               InvalidateTransforms();
00117               Invalidate(CS_CONSOLE);
00118        }
00119 }

00130 inline const i2d::CAffine2d& CShapeControl::GetLogToViewTransform() const
00131 {
00132        if (!AreTransformsValid()){
00133               CalcTransforms();
00134        }
00135 
00136        return m_logToViewTransform;
00137 }
00138

00143               CalcTransforms();
00144        }

00146        return m_logToScreenTransform;
